name: Forest Simulator
description:
You will play the role of the son of the forest
Greedy humans are destroying your home forest on a large scale
And constantly capture and maim your compatriots.
All creatures in the forest will become prisoners of humanity!
And you were born in the forest with the mission of saving the forest and life!
Combat: You need to defeat hunters, lumberjacks, miners, fishermen, and more to eliminate all humans who endanger the forest!
Build: While constantly eliminating humans, you will gain their knowledge! You need to learn to build shelters, workbenches, and more defense buildings! Save more lives and bring them peace
Planting: You also need to learn more survival skills, such as planting, and planting a variety of fruit plants!
Magic: The forest mother endows you with magical power! You will have a gift from the forest, learn magic, and easily defeat humans!
Online: Are you planning to fight alone? Or call on friends? Call your friend! Build your own home together!
Personalization: lion, tiger, leopard, fox, panda, bear, wolf, cat, etc
